content: keep your hands warm and stylish with these tumbledown mittens worked in one piece with no seams these mittens are quick to make they feature a beautiful diamond cable stitch along with the unique texture of the herringbone half_double_crochet stitch the diamond cable adds a pretty design while the herringbone stitch makes the mittens stretchy and a perfect fit for your hands -------------------------- you will receive -------------------------- 1 pdf digital download file for tumbledown mittens crochet pattern instant download as soon as payment clears ravelry s system written in english and u s crochet terms ---------------- yarn used ---------------- worsted weight #4 ------------------------------------- sizes ------------------------------------- toddler 5 c / 4 l hand child 6 c / 5 l hand small adult 7 c / 6 l hand large adult 8 c / 7 5 l hand ----------------- skill level ----------------- intermediate ---------- notes ---------- ~gauge is included in this pattern ~this pattern has been checked for accuracy although this has been tested please note that small errors can still slip by i am happy to assist if you need any help ~this is a free pattern on my blog but you can also purchase this listing for the ad-free downloadable pdf version ----------------------- downloading ----------------------- ~download instructions~ go to my notebook and find the pattern image for this purchase and a download link will accompany it i cannot email patterns to you ------------------------ where to print ------------------------ ~ home printer ~ local copy store -
